includedAssets.title: Episode 1
includedAssets.synopsis: While Selfridge's celebrates its fifth anniversary, Harry attempts to win Rose back as his family returns to London.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Selfridge's celebrates its fifth anniversary, Harry attempts to win Rose back as his family returns to London.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Selfridge's celebrates its fifth anniversary, Harry attempts to win Rose back as his family returns to London.

includedAssets.title: Episode 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Harry is forced to acknowledge his warehouse workers' complaints as their demands for greater rights become increasingly difficult to ignore.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harry is forced to acknowledge his warehouse workers' complaints as their demands for greater rights become increasingly difficult to ignore.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harry is forced to acknowledge his warehouse workers' complaints as their demands for greater rights become increasingly difficult to ignore.

includedAssets.title: Episode 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Agnes puts her all into the Empire Exhibition, Mr Crabb tries to hide Mr Grove's lateness and Rose shares a tense breakfast with Harry.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Agnes puts her all into the Empire Exhibition, Mr Crabb tries to hide Mr Grove's lateness and Rose shares a tense breakfast with Harry.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Agnes puts her all into the Empire Exhibition, Mr Crabb tries to hide Mr Grove's lateness and Rose shares a tense breakfast with Harry.

includedAssets.title: Episode 4
includedAssets.synopsis: As the war in Europe begins, the store's male staff begin to enlist. Meanwhile, Harry chooses a new deputy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the war in Europe begins, the store's male staff begin to enlist. Meanwhile, Harry chooses a new deputy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the war in Europe begins, the store's male staff begin to enlist. Meanwhile, Harry chooses a new deputy.

includedAssets.title: Episode 5
includedAssets.synopsis: Rose makes some suggestions to help the new staff in the loading bay, while Harry endeavours to do more to aid the war effort.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Rose makes some suggestions to help the new staff in the loading bay, while Harry endeavours to do more to aid the war effort.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Rose makes some suggestions to help the new staff in the loading bay, while Harry endeavours to do more to aid the war effort.

includedAssets.title: Episode 6
includedAssets.synopsis: The government spot a chance to use Harry, German goods are removed from the store and Lady Mae turns to an old friend to help boost the concert.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The government spot a chance to use Harry, German goods are removed from the store and Lady Mae turns to an old friend to help boost the concert.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The government spot a chance to use Harry, German goods are removed from the store and Lady Mae turns to an old friend to help boost the concert.

includedAssets.title: Episode 7
includedAssets.synopsis: As Grove and Crabb take on the running of the store in Harry's absence, Gordon is forced to take action after a terrible tragedy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Grove and Crabb take on the running of the store in Harry's absence, Gordon is forced to take action after a terrible tragedy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Grove and Crabb take on the running of the store in Harry's absence, Gordon is forced to take action after a terrible tragedy.

includedAssets.title: Episode 8
includedAssets.synopsis: Harry returns to London to find his reputation and business careering downhill, forcing him to turn to star power to arrest the slump.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harry returns to London to find his reputation and business careering downhill, forcing him to turn to star power to arrest the slump.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harry returns to London to find his reputation and business careering downhill, forcing him to turn to star power to arrest the slump.

includedAssets.title: Episode 9
includedAssets.synopsis: Harry tries to organise a special event to reinvigorate the store, Agnes questions her choices and more Selfridges descend on London.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harry tries to organise a special event to reinvigorate the store, Agnes questions her choices and more Selfridges descend on London.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harry tries to organise a special event to reinvigorate the store, Agnes questions her choices and more Selfridges descend on London.

includedAssets.title: Episode 10
includedAssets.synopsis: Lady Mae tries to clear Sefridge's name, while Victor and Agnes reveal their plans for the future and Harry finds his in tatters.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lady Mae tries to clear Sefridge's name, while Victor and Agnes reveal their plans for the future and Harry finds his in tatters.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lady Mae tries to clear Sefridge's name, while Victor and Agnes reveal their plans for the future and Harry finds his in tatters.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Five years after opening, Harry Selfridge's priorities begin to shift as his wife returns to London and war in Europe threatens his business. Second series of the period drama starring Jeremy Piven.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Five years after opening, Harry's priorities begin to shift as war threatens his business. Series two of the period drama starring Jeremy Piven.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Five years after opening, Harry Selfridge's priorities begin to shift as his wife returns to London and war in Europe threatens his business. Second series of the period drama starring Jeremy Piven.

includedIn.title: Mr. Selfridge
includedIn.synopsis: Harry Selfridge decides to build the world's biggest and best department store on London's Oxford Street. Early 20th century period drama.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Harry Selfridge decides to build the world's biggest and best department store on London's Oxford Street. Early 20th century period drama.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Harry Selfridge decides to build the world's biggest and best department store on London's Oxford Street. Early 20th century period drama.
